generalRules: Game is designed for hit and run scoring
Ties/arguments/fouls will always go to the batter and or offence
gameSetup: This is a fun ALL AGES game. (must be atleast 6)
All bats must be standard yellow plastic wiffle ball bats (taped/customized is fine)
battingRules: Third strike = swing and miss or hit the strike target
pitchingRules: Ball speed must be controlled and over the plate
Pitch speed should match the age/skill of batter
Pitchers will be warned for too much speed or inaccuracy
fieldingRules: Force outs by tagging the base
Tag outs by tagging the runner with the ball
